sentences.english: And the living creatures ran and returned as the appearance of a flash of lightning.
sentences.chinese: 這活物往來奔走，好像電光一閃。

sentences.english: I will prick every living thing near me with my tail.
sentences.chinese: 我會用我的刺扎任何靠近我的活物。

sentences.english: Psionic powers have their roots in a living body.
sentences.chinese: 心靈異能要以有生命的活物身體作爲根基。

sentences.english: And God said, " Let the earth bring forth living creatures of every kind."
sentences.chinese: 神說，地要生出活物來，各從其類。

sentences.english: Now the serpent was more crafty than any of the wild animals the Lord God had made.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華上帝所造的，惟有蛇比田野一切的活物更狡猾。

sentences.english: He's the most vile kind of creature.
sentences.chinese: 他是活物中最鄙俗的一種。

sentences.english: The planet only knew that this living thing was different.
sentences.chinese: 蓋雅只知道，這活物的與衆不同。

sentences.english: And the four beasts said, Amen.
Every being, from the smallest amoeba to the largest whale, share the same life stream.
sentences.chinese: 所有的活物，小至阿米巴蟲，大至鯨魚，皆源於一脈。

sentences.english: History is a funny animal. People can get lost in the mists of time.
sentences.chinese: 歷史是個有趣的活物，會將人物埋沒於時間的迷霧中。

sentences.english: There is not a living soul to be seen for miles around.
sentences.chinese: 這兒方圓幾英里內看不到一個活物。

sentences.english: It helps to think of your marriage as a living thing in itself.
sentences.chinese: 這有助於你在看待把自己的婚姻時當作活物來看待。

sentences.english: Nope， you are a walking 7）case study.
sentences.chinese: 不，你是一個活物個案研究。

sentences.english: They would kill almost anything that moved and eat it.
sentences.chinese: 他們可以殺掉任何活物，然後喫掉。

definition: insect or insect-like small creature (literary)/base person (used as a curse word)
human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
